name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in building high-performance solutions using **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **Angular**, along with robust database management using **PostgreSQL**. My experience includes leveraging **NestJS** for scalable application architecture and implementing rigorous testing with **Jest**. I have deep expertise in cloud platforms, particularly **GCP**, to deploy and manage applications efficiently.
I am committed to writing **Clean Code** and applying Domain-Driven Design (DDD) principles to ensure maintainable software. My collaborative approach and expertise in **Pair Programming** foster team synergy and drive project success, while my strong sense of autonomy and curiosity propels innovation and continuous learning.
Additionally, I have a background in full-stack development across **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, and I bring extensive experience in healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring adherence to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am well-versed in microservices, CI/CD automation, and integrating AI/ML capabilities for advanced analytics.
